lead_paragraph: Hauser Wirth & Schimmel acquired a former flour mill, and all the original street art that came with it. Then they commissioned some more.

headline.main: Preserving Old Graffiti at a New L.A. Gallery

snippet: Hauser Wirth & Schimmel acquired a former flour mill, and all the original street art that came with it. Then they commissioned some more.
abstract: Hauser Wirth & Schimmel gallery commissions graffiti artist Kim West to expand mural outside its new space, former flour mill in Los Angeles.
